mapper.select: select person.name,person.address1,payment.item,payment.buyer,payment.seller,payment.parentseq,payment.price,to_char(payment.paymentdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')as paymentdate,payment.boardtype,review.reviewable,review.contents from payment join person on (person.id=payment.seller)join review on (review.reviewer =payment.buyer)where payment.buyer=#{id} and payment.boardtype=#{product}
